title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Political Ideology in Higher Education and Technology-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Basic Understanding of Social Structures
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the influence of political ideologies within corporate governance structures and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can evaluate flexible work arrangements and support policies for marginalized groups to foster an inclusive workplace environment.
Learners can critically review policy directions for technology development, lifelong learning, and well-being enhancement.
Learners can propose actionable strategies for rebalancing work practices and rights

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
